about_the_game:
This is the original soundtrack including all of the background music for "ghostpia: Season One," composed by Hiromu Takano, a thriving modern composer.

Between the striking noise effects that characterize the main theme "Ghost," the Japanese-flavored tones of "Ninja," and the city-pop style of "City," that plays during the endings of each episode, you'll be able to enjoy the wide range of genres that color the chaotic world of ghostpia to your heart's content.
